name: TERMINOLOGY_ACCESS
documentation: Defines an object providing proxy access to a terminology.

all_codes.name: all_codes
all_codes.documentation: Return all codes known in this terminology.

codes_for_group_id.name: codes_for_group_id
codes_for_group_id.documentation: Return all codes under grouper 'a_group_id' from this terminology.

codes_for_group_name.name: codes_for_group_name
codes_for_group_name.documentation: Return all codes under grouper whose name in 'a_lang' is 'a_name' from this terminology.

has_code_for_group_id.name: has_code_for_group_id
has_code_for_group_id.documentation: True if  a_code' is known in group  group_id' in the openEHR terminology.

rubric_for_code.name: rubric_for_code
rubric_for_code.documentation: Return all rubric of code  code' in language  lang'.
